tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Four Painters Hit by 10000 Volt Electricity when Moving Scaffold!
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: This is the craziest thing I have ever seen! DESCRIPTION: All four were down with one managing to escape from the scene who survived. The other three died, one in hospital. Around 17:40 yesterday, located the urban water Nancun near the NICE factory with electric shock accident occurs in the region: four painters in moving a 9-meter-high scaffolding to accidentally touch one of ten thousand volt high-tension wires, two people were killed and two others were injured. After the incident, the City People's Hospital emergency dispatch medical personnel rushed to the scene. In addition to a man has confirmed that died on the spot, the ambulance picked up another 3 from the field. 6:00 pm, reporters rushed to the NICE. The accident took place in the plant's northeast corner, No. 301, next to the warehouse. Due to the strong current, the scaffolding installed at the bottom of plastic wheel even has melted and stuck to the ground. And even more shocking is that the man died on the spot lying under the scaffold, a charred face, the hair stood up, the body of white smoke emerge from time to time. "A burst of 'pop' sound, was to die." According to eyewitnesses, the incident was the man who had also once kindled a fire, and later others take to the fire extinguisher before the fire to be extinguished. It is understood that the four painters is not the the NICE company's employees were injured in the accident, just to No. 301 warehouse canopy painted. Afternoon when they are ready to ...

الله يستر يا اخوان ويحفظنا واياكم ويحسن الخاتمه ياااارب
المقطع هذا حسب المكتوب انهم كانوا يدفون السقاله والمنطقه بها ماء والسقاله ارجلها او كفراتها بلاستيك وضربت في كهرباء﻿ قوتها 1000 فولت مع العلم ان طول السقاله 9 امتار وذابت قاعدة السقاله البلاستيك وهي سبب الدخان القوي والسريع وتوفي ثلاثه وبقي واحد في العنايه المركزه وحسب الخبراء عندهم ان السقاله تفتقر لادنى جوده في السلامه ...
وفق الله الجميع هذي نبذه عن ما كتب
先日は本当にありがとうございました。正直半信半疑で「５００万円は多すぎるので50万円ください」とご連絡しましたが、本当にお金を頂けると思っていませんでした。今学費に困っていましたので本当に助かりました！！みなさんの批判の声もありますが、世のため人のためを思っている心ある方でしたので応援しています！！！・・・近々またメールしますね。﻿
